name: A Day with patoots
summary:
*Includes both PC and Android version.
The player can choose their name and skin tone. The rest of the animation and dialogue should reflect these changes.
At the moment the only H-scene I have completed is the handjob one. All the other options are just there as placeholders and come with a little bit of flavor text. 
The more lewd things you do with Patoots the hornier she gets. Her lewdness level dictates what you can and can’t choose. Get her too horny and she’ll refuse to do just about anything but fucking. 
“Lets Talk” has a bunch of pre-scripted dialogue and an option to have Patoots randomly talk about things. Of course, you can also admire certain *ahem* “assets” of hers.
“Mini Games” for now is just the old Rock, Paper, Scissors game. With the old static-images and a few bug fixes. Not much has changed there yet.
